requirements.summary: Update TemperaturePanel.tsx visual scale bar to use -50°C minimum and +110°C maximum bounds
acceptanceCriteria: The temperature scale bar renders -50°C as its leftmost (0%) position.
The temperature scale bar renders +110°C as its rightmost (100%) position.
A temperature reading of 0°C fills the bar to approximately 30.8% ((0-(-50))/(110-(-50))).
A temperature reading of 110°C fills the bar to 100%.
A temperature reading of -50°C fills the bar to 0%.
No other change is visible in the TemperaturePanel or any other dashboard panel.

file_operations.description: Update the visual scale bar logic to use -50°C as the minimum bound and +110°C as the maximum bound. Change the percentage fill calculation to use the new 160°C range (110 - (-50) = 160). Update any tick marks or scale labels to reflect the new bounds. Preserve all existing features: animated number display, ultra-precise display, color coding, typography, glassmorphism styling, and any other visual or behavioral aspects of the component.
